title: Episode 65: Brooklyn Winery
description: A winery in Brooklyn? It’s official! Tune in to Let’s Eat In with Cathy Erway as she’s joined by the head chef of Brooklyn Winery, Brian Pierce. Brian talks about how the winery came to be and how it serves the community of Williamsburg. Whether you’re interested in making your own wine or just feel like stopping by for trivia night – Brooklyn Winery is the spot! This episode was sponsored by Barterhouse Wines. For more information visit www.TheBarterhouse.com
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
